articles.content:
A U.S. Bankruptcy Court judge has approved The Weinstein Co's liquidation plan, which sets aside $17.1million for women who accused co-founder Harvey Weinstein of sexual misconduct.

articles.title: Jennifer Lopez hits back at trolls AGAIN for accusing her of having Botox - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 51, said she felt the need to respond to claims she'd used Botox to avoid being accused of trying to keep it secret, adding that her beauty secret is simply 'being kind to other women.'
articles.content:
Jennifer Lopez has been forced to hit back at trolls again after they accused her of having Botox.
